price: “O vi koji niste vjerovali, danas se ne pravdajte, bit ćete kažnjeni samo za ono što ste radili.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَا تَعۡتَذِرُواْ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ إِنَّمَا تُجۡزَوۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna kafarū lā taʿtadhirū al-yawma innamā tuj'zawna mā kuntum taʿmalūna
